metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13614 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in ssl.c in Axel before 2.17.8. The TLS implementation lacks hostname verification.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-13614` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

axel - 2.17.10-2
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> if addressing this issue, may also want to add wildcard hostname support as described in axel github issue 271

criterions.comment: axel package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.17.10-2').
